org.jooby

Interface Locals

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Request, Session
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Request.Forwarding

    public interface Locals
    Local attributes for Request and Session.
    Author:
    edgar

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<String,Object> attributes() 
      <T> Optional<T> get(String name)
      Get a named object.
      default boolean isSet(String name)
      Test if the var name exists inside the local attributes.
      Locals set(String name, Object value)
      Set a local using a the given name.
      Locals unset()
      Unset/remove all the session data.
      <T> Optional<T> unset(String name)
      Remove a local value (if any) from session locals.

    • Method Detail

      • get

        @Nonnull
<T> Optional<T> get(@Nonnull
                             String name)
        Get a named object. If the object isn't found this method returns an empty optional.
        Type Parameters:
        T - Target type.
        Parameters:
        name - A local var's name.
        Returns:
        A value or empty optional.

      • attributes

        @Nonnull
Map<String,Object> attributes()
        Returns:
        An immutable copy of local attributes.

      • isSet

        default boolean isSet(@Nonnull
                      String name)
        Test if the var name exists inside the local attributes.
        Parameters:
        name - A local var's name.
        Returns:
        True, for existing locals.

      • set

        @Nonnull
Locals set(@Nonnull
                    String name,
                    @Nonnull
                    Object value)
        Set a local using a the given name. If a local already exists, it will be replaced with the new value. Keep in mind that ONLY none null values are allowed.
        Parameters:
        name - A local var's name.
        value - A local values.
        Returns:
        This locals.

      • unset

        <T> Optional<T> unset(String name)
        Remove a local value (if any) from session locals.
        Type Parameters:
        T - A local type.
        Parameters:
        name - A local var's name.
        Returns:
        Existing value or empty optional.

      • unset

        Locals unset()
        Unset/remove all the session data.
        Returns:
        This locals.
